messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Investigator Lewis and Chauffer Rodney Robinson, at approxim@tely 12:31am, moved the decedent. A 9mm Luger casing was found in the blood pool where the body had been. Technician Muhammad documented and collected the evidence. Sergeant McMullen briefed Detective Morton on a blood trail leading from the crime scene to North Derbignay Street. At 2:30AM, Crime Lab Technician Tamika Rogers performed gunshot residue tests on Darceleen Commodore and Earlitta Taylor. Detective David Trehanâ€™s records from the Coroner's Office confirmed the deaths as homicides. Detective Morton engaged with Darceleen Commodore regarding her ordeal with Reynell Payne. Homicide Investigators, including Detective Aucoin, secured the crime scene. Detective Morton, after reviewing the Fifth District Incident Report, sought all related communications. He and Detective Orlando Mathews interviewed Earlitta Taylor, who knew the victims well. Detective Mathews assembled suspect line-ups for witness identification. Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer Gary Sallienger contributed to the scene sketch. Detective Sergeant Chris Robert, Officer Juan Lopez, Officers Phil Burras & Quincy Broaden, Officers Nate Addison & Glen Hewitt, Detective Gregory Johnson, Detective Jason McGee, Detective Ananie Mitchell, Detective Melvin McCullum, and Detective Pratt from the Homicide Section all played roles in the investigation and processing of various crime scenes.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Assisted in moving the decedent and was present when a 9mm Luger casing was found.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Chauffer Rodney RobinsonOfficer Context: Assisted Investigator Lewis in moving the decedent.Officer Role: ChaufferOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Documented and collected the 9mm Luger casing found
